channel.title: Player on alper.nl
channel.description: Recent content in Player on alper.nl

item.title: Lazy ass music videos
item.description:
So I get bored on a Friday night and I want a decent way to watch music videos. Rather than look for a service which provides this ((Surely there are a ton of usable music video players online by now.)), I decided to revive our own toy of a couple years ago, so it’s alive (again!): LastTV.

More explanation here. And I guess this blatantly labels me as a programmer, no?
